On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The living spell can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Magical Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) radiant damage.

action.name: Spell Mimicry {@recharge 5}
entries: A dazzling array of flashing, colored light springs from the living spell. Roll {@dice 6d10}; the total is how many hit points of creatures are affected. Creatures in a 15-foot cone originating from the living spell are affected in ascending order of their current hit points (ignoring {@condition unconscious} creatures and creatures that can't see).

Starting with the creature that has the lowest current hit points, each creature affected by this spell is {@condition blinded} until the end of the living spell's next turn. Subtract each creature's hit points from the total before moving on to the creature with the next lowest hit points. A creature's hit points must be equal to or less than the remaining total for that creature to be affected.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The living spell can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The living spell makes two magical strike attacks.

action.name: Magical Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 5d6 + 4}) radiant damage.

action.name: Spell Mimicry {@recharge 5}
entries: A dazzling array of flashing, colored light springs from the living spell. Roll {@dice 10d10}; the total is how many hit points of creatures are affected. Creatures in a 15-foot cone originating from the living spell are affected in ascending order of their current hit points (ignoring {@condition unconscious} creatures and creatures that can't see).

Starting with the creature that has the lowest current hit points, each creature affected by this spell is {@condition blinded} until the end of the living spell's next turn. Subtract each creature's hit points from the total before moving on to the creature with the next lowest hit points. A creature's hit points must be equal to or less than the remaining total for that creature to be affected.

trait.name: Fire Form
entries: The drudge can move through a space 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the drudge or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage. In addition, the drudge can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage and catches fire; taking 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns until someone takes an action to douse the fire.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The drudge sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light in an additional 20 feet.

trait.name: Water Susceptibility
entries: The drudge takes 1 cold damage for every 5 feet it moves in water or gallon of water splashed on it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The drudge makes two touch attacks.

action.name: Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
entries: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic is also {@condition grappled} by it (escape {@dc 15}). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

trait.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
entries: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

trait.name: Grappler
entries: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature {@condition grappled} by it.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 6 ({@damage 1d12}) acid damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Echo is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

trait.name: Dark Devotion
entries: Echo has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Warforged Resilience
entries: Echo has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned} and he is immune to disease. He does not need to eat, drink, or breathe. He doesn't need to sleep and doesn't suffer the effects of {@condition exhaustion} due to lack of rest, and magic can't put him to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Echo makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Thelestes' spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 21}). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During her first turn, Thelestes has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit she scores against a {@status surprised|XPHB} creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, Thelestes can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: Thelestes ignores the range restriction on its telepathy when communicating with a creature she has {@condition charmed}. The two don't even need to be on the same plane of existence.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: Thelestes can use her action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into her true form. Without wings, she loses hers flying speed. Other than her size and speed, her statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. She reverts to its true form if she dies.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Thelestes deals an extra 21 ({@damage 6d6}) damage when she hits a target with her shadow blade attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 ft. of an ally of Thelestes that isn't incapacitated and she doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Multiattack
entries: The thelestes makes three weapon attacks.

trait.name: Shadow Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) psychic damage.

trait.name: Spiked Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d4 + 6}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition incapacitated} until the end of the creature's next turn.

trait.name: Claw (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Charm
entries: One humanoid Thelestes can see within 30 feet of her must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} for 1 day. The {@condition charmed} target obeys Thelestes' verbal or telepathic commands. If the target suffers any harm or receives a suicidal command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. If the target successfully saves against the effect, or if the effect on it ends, the target is immune to Thelestes' Charm for the next 24 hours.
Thelestes can have up to three targets {@condition charmed} at a time. If she charms another beyond that, the effect on the earliest target ends.

trait.name: Draining Kiss
entries: Thelestes kisses a creature {@condition charmed} by it or a willing creature. The target must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 46 ({@damage 7d10 + 8}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to O.

reaction.name: Vanishing Dodge (Recharges 4-6)
entries: When Thelestes takes damage, she turns {@condition invisible} and teleports up to 90 feet to an unoccupied space she's aware of. She remains {@condition invisible} until the end of her next turn or until she attacks or casts a spell.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Thelestes makes one weapon attack.

legendary.name: Shift
entries: Thelestes moves up to half her speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Sow Discord (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: One creature {@condition charmed} by Thelestes uses its reaction to make one attack against a target of her choice that she can see.

vulnerable.note: from silvered weapons wielded by creatures with a charisma score of at least 18

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Sora Katra's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 21}). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Shared Spellcasting
headerEntries: For coven spells, Sora Katra's spell save DC is 20, and her spell attack bonus is +12.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Sora Katra can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Fiendish Inspiration {@recharge 4}
entries: As a bonus action, Sora Katra can grant an ally within 30 feet a Bardic Inspiration die as the Bard feature, except the die is a {@dice d12}.
Alternatively, she can use this ability as a reaction to roll a {@dice d12} and subtract the number rolled from an attack roll or saving throw of a creature she can see within 30 feet.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If Sora Katra fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Sora Katra has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: Sora Katra can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 21} Wisdom ({@skill Insight|XPHB}) check.

trait.name: Sora Kell's Blessing
entries: Sora Katra's AC includes her Charisma bonus.
ActionsClaws. Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage and 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage.

trait.name: Fiendish Charm
entries: One humanoid Sora Katra can see within 30 feet of her must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} for 1 day. The {@condition charmed} target obeys Sora Katra's spoken commands. If the target suffers any harm or receives a suicidal command from Sora Katra, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Sora Katra's Fiendish Charm for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Illusory Appearance
entries: Sora Katra covers herself and anything she is wearing or carrying with a magical illusion that makes her look like another creature of her general size and humanoid shape. The illusion ends if Sora Katra takes a bonus action to end it or if she dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, Sora Katra could appear to have smooth skin, but someone touching her would feel her rough flesh. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a {@dc 20} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation|XPHB}) check to discern that she is disguised.

trait.name: Invisible Passage
entries: Sora Katra magically turns {@condition invisible} until she attacks or casts a spell, or until her {@status Concentration|XPHB} ends (as if {@status Concentration|XPHB|Concentrating} on a spell). While {@condition invisible}, she leaves no physical evidence of her passage, so she can be tracked only by magic. Any equipment she wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with her.

trait.name: Weave Curse
entries: Sora Katra weaves a magical curse on one creature she can see within 60 feet. The target must make a {@dc 21} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, it is cursed with vulnerability to psychic damage. On a successful save, the creature isn't cursed.

A creature cursed by this effect must make another Charisma saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If it successfully saves against this effect three times, the curse ends. If it fails its saves three times, the weave of the curse becomes complete and the target suffers one of the below additional effects, which can only be reversed by a carefully worded wish:

items.name: 1. Eternal Slumber
entries: The target falls asleep and can't be awoken. While asleep, it ceases to age and doesn't require food or water.

items.name: 2. Form of Punishment
entries: The target is polymorphed into the form of a beast or construct with a challenge rating of 0. The target's statistics are entirely replaced by those of its new form, except it retains its alignment, personality, Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, and ability to speak.

items.name: 3. Magic Prison
entries: The target shrinks to a height of 1 inch and is imprisoned inside a magically created jar, vase, or similar object.
The target may communicate with anyone holding the object telepathically.

legendary.name: Claws
entries: Sora Katra makes one attack with her claws.

legendary.name: Beguile (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Sora Katra uses her Fiendish Charm, Weave Curse, or casts {@spell modify memory|XPHB}.

legendary.name: Misdirect (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Sora Katra uses her Illusory Appearance, {@condition Invisible|XPHB} Passage, or casts {@spell mislead|XPHB}.

legendary.name: Will of the Coven (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Sora Katra casts one of the shared spells from the Coven of Sora Kell if she is within 60 feet of both of her sisters.

variant.name: The Coven of Sora Kell
entries: When hags must work together, they form covens, in spite of their selfish natures. A coven is made up of hags of any type, all of whom are equals within the group. However, each of the hags continues to desire more personal power.

A coven consists of three hags so that any arguments between two hags can be settled by the third. If more than three hags ever come together, as might happen if two covens come into conflict, the result is usually chaos.

entries.name: Shared Spellcasting (Coven Only)
headerEntries: While all three Daughters of Sora Kell are within 60 feet of one another, they can each cast the following spells from the wizard spell list but must share the spell slots among themselves:
footerEntries: When casting these spells, each Daughter is a 20th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as her spellcasting ability. The spell save DC is 14 + the Daughter's Intelligence modifier, and the spell attack bonus is 6 + the Daughter's Intelligence modifier

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Sora Maenya's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 19}). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
will: {@spell alter self|XPHB} (can take the form of a Medium humanoid)

spellcasting.name: Shared Spellcasting
headerEntries: For coven spells, Sora Maenya's spell save DC is 16, and her spell attack bonus is +8.

trait.name: Fiendish Fury
entries: Sora Maenya has advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws, and has a +6 bonus to damage rolls that deal bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage (already included).

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If Sora Maenya fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Sora Maenya has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Sora Kell's Blessing
entries: Sora Maenya's AC includes her Charisma bonus.

trait.name: Stolen Teeth and Iron Claws
entries: Sora Maenya's melee weapon attacks are magical and ignore damage resistances and immunities.
ActionsMultiattack. Sora Maenya makes three attacks: two with her claws and one with her bite.

trait.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d6 + 13}) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, Sora Maenya immediately devours part of the target, killing it instantly.

trait.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d6 + 13}) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 23}). Sora Maenya can grapple up to two targets, one in each claw.

reaction.name: Bind Soul
entries: When Sora Maenya kills a humanoid with her Bite, she may remove its skull and bind the creature's soul to it. The target cannot be restored to life while its soul is bound to the skull.

While the soul is bound to its skull, Sora Maenya can take an action to make the skull start or stop shedding magical light like a hooded lantern. While Sora Maenya has a soul-bound skull on her person, she can produce one of the following effects:

items.name: 1. Consume Knowledge
entries: Sora Maenya can learn the answer to one question the soul would be able to answer. The information she gains is true to the best of the soul's knowledge.

items.name: 2. Devour Vitality
entries: Sora Maenya can use a bonus action to devour part of the soul's vitality and regain {@dice 2d8} hit points.

items.name: 3. Drain Essence
entries: Sora Maenya can use a bonus action to invigorate herself with part of the soul's essence, making her next attack roll, ability check, or saving throw with advantage. If she doesn't use this benefit before the start of her next turn, it is lost.

Once Sora Maenya exploits a soul six times by using any of the above effects, it is completely destroyed and ceases to exist. No mortal magic, not even true resurrection or wish, can recover a soul from such a fate.
A bound soul remains inside the skull until it or the skull is destroyed.
If the skull is destroyed before the soul is, the soul escapes to the afterlife.

legendary.name: Chomp
entries: Sora Maenya makes one bite attack.

legendary.name: Smell Prey
entries: Sora Maenya makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) check with advantage.

legendary.name: Mind Games (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Sora Maenya casts one of her innate spells.

legendary.name: Rending Embrace (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by Sora Maenya must make a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw, taking 30 ({@damage 5d6 + 13}) piercing damage and 30 ({@damage 5d6 + 13}) slashing damage on a failed saving throw, or half as much of each on a success.

legendary.name: Will of the Coven (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Sora Maenya casts one of the shared spells from the Coven of Sora Kell if she is within 60 feet of both of her sisters.

variant.name: The Coven of Sora Kell
entries: When hags must work together, they form covens, in spite of their selfish natures. A coven is made up of hags of any type, all of whom are equals within the group. However, each of the hags continues to desire more personal power.

A coven consists of three hags so that any arguments between two hags can be settled by the third. If more than three hags ever come together, as might happen if two covens come into conflict, the result is usually chaos.

headerEntries: While all three Daughters of Sora Kell are within 60 feet of one another, they can each cast the following spells from the wizard spell list but must share the spell slots among themselves:
footerEntries: When casting these spells, each Daughter is a 20th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as her spellcasting ability. The spell save DC is 14 + the Daughter's Intelligence modifier, and the spell attack bonus is 6 + the Daughter's Intelligence modifier

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Sora Teraza's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 19}). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Shared Spellcasting
headerEntries: For coven spells, Sora Teraza's spell save DC is 24, and her spell attack bonus is +16.

trait.name: Dream Vision
entries: Though Sora Teraza is blind, her oracular vision grants her several benefits. She can't be magically put to sleep, nor can she be {@status surprised|XPHB}. Additionally, she always acts first in the initiative order (she acts on an initiative count equal to one higher than the highest initiative rolled among a combat's participants). Finally, she gains a bonus to her Armor Class and Dexterity saving throws equal to her Intelligence modifier (included above).

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If Sora Teraza fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Sora Teraza has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Sora Kell's Blessing
entries: Sora Teraza's AC includes her Charisma bonus.
ActionsClaws. Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage and 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage.

trait.name: Nightmare Gaze
entries: Sora Teraza fixes her blind gaze on each creature she can sense within a 60-foot cone. Creatures in the area must make a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) psychic damage, or half as much damage on a success. Regardless of success or failure, if the creature is {@condition unconscious}, it takes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage and is cursed. The curse can take one of the following forms, chosen by Sora Teraza individually for each creature so cursed:

items.name: 1. Night Terrors
entries: The cursed creature's hit point maximum decreases by 16 ({@dice 3d10}) whenever it finishes a long rest.

items.name: 2. Tabula Rasa
entries: The cursed creature's proficiency bonus is reduced to 0 and it cannot remember any events prior to reaching adulthood.

items.name: 3. Laid Bare
entries: The cursed creature's entire life story is magically written into a waiting book in Sora Teraza's library. While the creature is cursed, Sora Teraza may cast {@spell legend lore|XPHB} and name the cursed creature, regardless of its legendary significance.
Whichever effect Sora Teraza choose for a curse, it cannot be removed except by a carefully worded wish.

reaction.name: Dream Eater
entries: When an {@condition unconscious} creature within 30 feet of Sora Teraza regains consciousness, she can force the creature to make a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw. Unless the save succeeds, the creature takes 33 ({@damage 6d10}) psychic damage, and Sora Teraza regains hit points equal to the amount of damage taken.

legendary.name: Claws
entries: Sora Teraza makes one attack with her claws.

legendary.name: Cursed Glance
entries: One creature of Sora Teraza's choice within 120 ft. of her must make a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature is cursed. Sora Teraza chooses one of the options from her Nightmare Gaze to lay upon the creature. This curse cannot be removed except by a carefully worded wish.

legendary.name: Dream Caller (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Sora Teraza casts one of her innate spells.

legendary.name: Will of the Coven (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Sora Teraza casts one of the shared spells from the Coven of Sora Kell if she is within 60 feet of both of her sisters.

variant.name: The Coven of Sora Kell
entries: When hags must work together, they form covens, in spite of their selfish natures. A coven is made up of hags of any type, all of whom are equals within the group. However, each of the hags continues to desire more personal power.

A coven consists of three hags so that any arguments between two hags can be settled by the third. If more than three hags ever come together, as might happen if two covens come into conflict, the result is usually chaos.

entries.name: Shared Spellcasting (Coven Only)
headerEntries: While all three Daughters of Sora Kell are within 60 feet of one another, they can each cast the following spells from the wizard spell list but must share the spell slots among themselves:
footerEntries: When casting these spells, each Daughter is a 20th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as her spellcasting ability. The spell save DC is 14 + the Daughter's Intelligence modifier, and the spell attack bonus is 6 + the Daughter's Intelligence modifier

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The quori can innately cast mage armor, requiring no components, targeting itself only. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

trait.name: Manifest Mindblades
entries: As a bonus action, the quori can create a two shortsword-sized, visible blade of psionic energy. The weapons appear at the end of the tsoreva's alien arms and vanishes if the quori dies or is {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Frightful Strike (1/Turn)
entries: When the quori hits with a mindblade attack, the attack deals an additional 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage and the target must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the quori for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tsoreva makes two mindblade attacks.

action.name: Mindblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) psychic damage.

action.name: Possession {@recharge}
entries: One humanoid that the quori can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the quori; the quori then disappears, and the target is {@condition incapacitated} and loses control of its body. The quori now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The quori can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn fiends, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the quori ends it as a bonus action, or the quori is turned or forced out by an effect like the {@spell dispel evil and good|XPHB} spell. When the possession ends, the quori reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body.
The target is immune to this quori's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The quori's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}; {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
will: {@spell enthrall|XPHB} (the distracting words are spoken telepathically)
{@spell magic missile|XPHB} (5th-level; one target only, 7 invisible missiles)

1e: {@spell inflict wounds|XPHB} (6th level; deals psychic damage)

trait.name: Mind Schism
entries: The quori may cast any of its innate spells as a bonus action if the spell normally has a casting time of 1 action. It is not limited to casting a cantrip if it casts a second spell in the same turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The quori makes four pincer attacks.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). The quori has four pincers, each of which can grapple one target.

If a creature is hit by two pincer attacks in one turn, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Charisma save. On a failure, the creature is {@condition incapacitated} for 1 round while its mind is filled with doubt and it hears thoughts of self-loathing. A creature with Intelligence 4 or less is unaffected.

action.name: Possession {@recharge}
entries: One humanoid that the quori can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the quori; the quori then disappears, and the target is {@condition incapacitated} and loses control of its body. The quori now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The quori can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn fiends, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the quori ends it as a bonus action, or the quori is turned or forced out by an effect like the {@spell dispel evil and good|XPHB} spell. When the possession ends, the quori reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body.
The target is immune to this quori's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the predator can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature it can see.

trait.name: Lord's Homunculus
entries: If the {@spell mending|XPHB} spell is cast on the predator, it regains {@dice 2d6} hit points.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The predator has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The predator has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the predator's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The predator makes two melee weapon attacks.

action.name: Force-Empowered Rend
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@dice 1d8 + 4} plus 2) force damage.

reaction.name: Pack Distraction
entries: When the Lord of Blades makes an attack against a creature within 5 feet of the predator, he gains advantage on the attack.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Mindartis has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put her to sleep.

trait.name: Necromancer
entries: Any undead creature summoned or created by Mindartis has multiattack action if it doesn't already and it's speed increases by 10 ft. up tp 30 ft.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The major makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
entries: Jalinda can take the Hide action even when she is obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than her.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
entries: Jalinda can move through the space of any creature that is a size larger than her, but she can't stop in the same space.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Once per turn, Jalinda can deal an extra {@damage 2d6} damage to one creature she hits with an attack roll if she has Advantage on the roll and the attack uses a Finesse or a Ranged weapon. The extra damage's type is the same as the weapon's type.

She doesn't need Advantage on the attack roll if at least one of her allies is within 5 feet of the target, the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition, and she doesn't have Disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Cut and Run
entries: Starting at 3rd level, Jalinda learns to minimize danger by darting in and out of battle. Whenever she uses her Sneak Attack feature against a target, she regains all expended speed she may have used that turn.

trait.name: Waste Not Want Not
entries: If Jalinda fails a harvesting check to harvest a material, she may immediately attempt that check again at disadvantage. On a success, she successfully harvests that material, but it is worth only half of its normal monetary value. This feature may only be used once per creature she attempts to harvest.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +3} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: On her turn, Jalinda can take one of the following actions as a Bonus Action: Dash, Disengage, or Hide.

bonus.name: Steady Aim
entries: As a Bonus Action, Jalinda gives herself Advantage on her next attack roll on the current turn. She can use this feature only if she hasn't moved during this turn, and after she use it, her Speed is 0 until the end of the current turn.

action.name: Multiattack.
entries: Thora makes three attacks with her longsword.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Maneuvers
entries: Thora's intensive training allows her to use combat maneuvers efficiently. When she makes an attack, she can choose to use one of her manuevers.

items.name: Disarming Attack
items.entry: When she hits a creature with an attack roll, she can expend one Superiority Die to attempt to disarm the target. She adds the Superiority Die roll to the attack's damage roll. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or drop one object of her choice that it's holding, with the object landing in its space.

items.name: Goading Attack
items.entry: When she hits a creature with an attack roll, she can expend one Superiority Die to attempt to goad the target into attacking her. She adds the Superiority Die to the attack's damage roll. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or have Disadvantage on attack rolls against targets other than her until the end of her next turn.

items.name: Menacing Attack
items.entry: When she hits a creature with an attack roll, she can expend one Superiority Die to attempt to frighten the target. She adds the Superiority Die to the attack's damage roll. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or have the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition until the end of her next turn.

items.name: Trip Attack
items.entry: When she hits a creature with an attack roll using a weapon or an Unarmed Strike, she can expend one Superiority Die and add the die to the attack's damage roll. If the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or have the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

trait.name: Aberrant Dragonmark
entries: Thora's aberrant mark allows her to sense the presence of other marks.

reaction.name: Riposte
entries: When a creature misses Thora with a melee attack roll, she can expend one Superiority Die to make a melee attack roll with a weapon or an Unarmed Strike against the creature. If she hits, she adds the Superiority Die to the attack's damage.

bonus.name: Lunging Attack
entries: As a Bonus Action, Thora can expend one Superiority Die and take the Dash action. If she moves at least 5 feet in a straight line immediately before hitting with a melee attack as part of the Attack action on this turn, she can add the Superiority Die to the attack's damage roll.

bonus.name: Second Wind
entries: As a Bonus Action, Thora can regain {@dice 3d10} Hit Points.

monster.name: Xag-ya
languages: understands Deep Speech but doesn't speak

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the xag-ya dies, it explodes in a burst of radiant energy. Each creature within 15 feet of it must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites and burns with radiant fire for 1 minute. Metallic objects hit by the burst glow white hot for 1 minute as if under the effects of a {@spell heat metal|XPHB} spell. The fire can be extinguished with magic that deals cold damage or similar effects or by casting {@spell dispel magic|XPHB} or similar spell upon it. Until the fire is extinguished or goes out, the target takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) radiant damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Pure Radiance
entries: A creature that touches the xag-ya takes 9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) radiant damage. Flammable objects that touch the xag-ya ignite and burn with a radiant fire for 1 minute. If a creature hits the xag-ya with a metallic weapon, the weapon suffers the effects of a {@spell heat metal|XPHB} spell for 1 minute.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The xag-ya makes four attacks with its tendrils and uses its Radiant Bolt if it can.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) radiant damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites and burns with radiant fire for 1 minute. Metallic objects hit by the tendril glow white hot for 1 minute as if under the effects of a {@spell heat metal|XPHB} spell. The fire can be extinguished with magic that deals cold damage or similar effects or by casting {@spell dispel magic|XPHB} or similar spell upon it. Until the fire is extinguished or goes out, the target takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) radiant damage at the start of each of its turns.

action.name: Radiant Bolt {@recharge 4}
entries: The xag-ya fires a bolt of radiant energy at one target it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) radiant damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites and burns with radiant fire for 1 minute. Metallic objects hit by the bolt glow white hot for 1 minute as if under the effects of a {@spell heat metal|XPHB} spell. The fire can be extinguished with magic that deals cold damage or similar effects or by casting {@spell dispel magic|XPHB} or similar spell upon it. Until the fire is extinguished or goes out, the target takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) radiant damage at the start of each of its turns.

monster.name: Xeg-yi
languages: understands Deep Speech but doesn't speak

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the xeg-yi dies, it explodes in a burst of necrotic energy. Each creature within 10 feet of it must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Any nonmagical armor worn by a target hit by the burst is partly dissolved and takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

trait.name: Pure Necrosis
entries: A creature that touches the xeg-yi takes 9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) necrotic damage. Any nonmagical weapon made of metal or wood that hits the xeg-yi corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal or wood that hits the xeg-yi is destroyed after dealing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The xeg-yi makes four attacks with its tendrils and uses its Necrotic Bolt if it can.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) necrotic damage. In addition, nonmagical armor worn by the target is partly dissolved and takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

action.name: Necrotic Bolt {@recharge 4}
entries: The xeg-yi fires a bolt of necrotic energy at one target it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) necrotic damage. In addition, nonmagical armor worn by the target is partly dissolved and takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

trait.name: Cinder Aura
entries: At the end of each turn, each creature within 5 feet of  the swarm takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) Fire damage. Creatures and flammable objects inside the area start burning. Until someone takes an action to douse the fire, a burning creature takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns. Both of the damages are lowered to {@dice 1d10}'s if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

trait.name: Water Susceptibility
entries: The cinder swarm takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Cold damage for every 5 feet the swarm moves in water or for every gallon of water splashed on it.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The cinder swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny elemental. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The demonthorn mandrake makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Spore Pod {@recharge 5}
entries: The demonthorn mandrake spits a spore pod at a point within 30 feet of it that it can see. The pod then explodes in a 10-foot radius sphere. All living creatures within that area must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} and take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage as thorny growths burst from its face and body. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target takes an additional 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage at the start of each of its turns. The {@condition poisoned} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature can also use an action to pour a vial of holy water onto the {@condition poisoned} creature's face, ending the effect on that creature as the growths wither and die.

action.name: Tangleroot
entries: The demonthorn mandrake extends its roots in a 30-foot radius centered on itself. Each creature touching the ground that enters that area or starts its turn in the area must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or become {@condition restrained}. The demonthorn mandrake can target a {@condition restrained} creature with its slam attacks, even if that creature is outside the slam's normal reach. As an action, a {@condition restrained} creature can attempt a {@dc 14} Strength check, breaking free of the roots and freeing itself on a success. The demonthorn mandrake can't move while its roots are extended. It can retract its roots as a bonus action, ending the effect and releasing all entangled creatures.

trait.name: Thorned Body
entries: A creature that touches the battlebriar or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Impale
entries: A creature who is {@condition grappled} by the battlebriar has disadvantage on their check to break the grapple. Any creature who starts their turn {@condition grappled} by the battlebriar takes 10 ({@damage 2d10}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled}. The battlebriar can have up to two Large or smaller creatures {@condition grappled} at the same time.

action.name: Thorn Volley {@recharge}
entries: The battlebriar launches a volley of thorns in a 30-foot cone. Each creature within the area of the cone must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 20 ({@damage 4d10}) piercing damage, half as much on a success.

trait.name: Thorned Body
entries: A creature that touches the battlebriar or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Impale
entries: A creature who is {@condition grappled} by the battlebriar has disadvantage on their check to break the grapple. Any creature who starts their turn {@condition grappled} by the battlebriar takes 6 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled}. The battlebriar can have up to two Medium or smaller creatures {@condition grappled} at the same time.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The archon's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The archon is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a long rest. It knows the following bard spells:

trait.name: Archon Resilience
entries: The archon has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The archon's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The archon can use its Benediction. It then makes two attacks or casts a cantrip.

action.name: Lexicon Hammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands, plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage.

action.name: Benediction
entries: The archon utters a word of consecration, choosing one creature within 60 feet of it that can hear it. The target magically regains 5 ({@dice 2d4}) hit points and it has advantage on the next attack roll or saving throw it makes before the start of the archon's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Krozen casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}):

trait.name: Driven (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Krozen rerolls a failed ability check, attack roll, or saving throw with advantage.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Krozen wears an {@item amulet of health|XDMG}, +2 plate armor, and {@item gauntlets of ogre power|XDMG}, and he wields a {@item mace of disruption|XDMG}. While Krozen holds the mace, it sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

Krozen may additionally be equipped with legendary items or artifacts retrieved by Argentum agents if he has time to prepare, though most of the items retrieved by the Argentum are evil or cursed in nature.

action.name: Mace of Smiting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage. If the target is a construct, it takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage.
If a construct is reduced to 25 hit points or fewer by this damage, it is destroyed.

action.name: Flame Strike (5th-Level Spell; 3/Day)
entries: A vertical column of divine fire roars down from the heavens on a point within 60 feet that Krozen specifies. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on that point must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage and 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Healing Aurora (4th-Level Spell; 3/Day)
entries: Krozen and each creature of his choice that he can see within 60 feet of him regains 13 ({@dice 2d8 + 4}) hit points.

reaction.name: Divine Authority
entries: When Krozen casts a spell of 1st level or higher, one ally he can see within 30 feet of him can use its reaction to make one weapon attack against a creature of Krozen's choice.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Gold Blade makes three attacks with its longsword.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Blademark Strike
entries: The Gold Blade makes a longsword attack against a creature that leaves its reach, even if the creature took the Disengage action. If the attack hits, the target's speed is reduced to 0 for the rest of its turn. This reaction occurs before the target's triggering movement.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the Old Went can deal an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of his that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

Sneak Attack (1/Turn): Old Went deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of his that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and he doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (3/Day)
headerEntries: The blade casts dimension door, requiring no spell components and using Dexterity as the spellcasting ability.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The blade makes three attacks with its longsword.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Dimension Grasp
entries: The blade targets one item it can see within 30 feet that weighs no more than 10 pounds. The item teleports to the blade's waiting hand. If the targetted item is being held or worn by a creature, the creature can make a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw. On a success, the item is not teleported.

action.name: Dimension Thrust
entries: The blade can expend a use of dimension door if it has any remaining. If it does, the blade does not cast the spell. Instead, one creature it can see within 60 feet must make a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw. On a failure, the target takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) force damage and it and all equipment it is wearing or carrying are teleported horizontally to a space the blade chooses within 500 feet of it. The space can be one the blade can see, one it can describe by stating distance and direction, or one it is familiar with within range (such as "the holding cell in the cargo cart of this lightning rail"). On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, and is not teleported.

bonus.name: Dimension Stride
entries: The blade and all equipment it is wearing or carrying teleports up to its speed to an unoccupied space it can see.

reaction.name: Dimension Swap
entries: When a creature within 60 feet of the blade that it can see is hit by an attack roll, the blade can expend a use of dimension door if it has any remaining. If it does, the blade does not cast the spell. Instead, the blade teleports itself and the creature, along with any equipment they are wearing or carrying, such that they exchange positions. The blade is then hit by the attack instead.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The wand adept casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}; +7 with spell attacks):

trait.name: Superior Wand Efficiency
entries: When the wand adept uses a wand as an arcane focus to cast a cantrip, it adds its Intelligence modifier to the cantrip's damage and the cantrip is cast as though the wand adept is an 11th-level spellcaster (already included).

action.name: Wands Akimbo
entries: The wand adept draws two wands (if it does not already have two drawn), and casts either two cantrips or one cantrip twice.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The defender casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:

trait.name: Vigilant Guardian
entries: Creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against allies of the defender that are within 5 feet of it, unless the defender is {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The defender makes three attacks with its longsword.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) slashing damage if an ally of the defender it can see has less than maximum hit points.

bonus.name: Manifest Defenders (2/Day)
entries: The defender magically summons ephemeral duplicates of itself and its equipment made up of dragonmark-like lines of force that last for 1 minute. The duplicates move about in a 15-foot sphere centered on the defender that moves with it. When a creature hostile to the defender or the defender's allies enters the sphere for the first time on its turn, or starts its turn there, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 13 ({@damage 3d8}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

reaction.name: Vigilant Strike
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the defender that it can see is hit by an attack, the defender can swap places with that creature, and be hit by the attack instead. After the attack is resolved, the defender can then make a melee weapon attack with advantage against the attacker.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The host casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

trait.name: Brave
entries: The host has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
entries: The host can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than it.

trait.name: Lucky
entries: When the host rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, it can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The medic casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:

trait.name: Brave
entries: The medic has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
entries: The medic can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than it.

trait.name: Lucky
entries: When the medic rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, it can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Anatomical Knowledge (1/Turn)
entries: When the medic hits with a melee weapon attack against a humanoid creature within 5 feet of it, the target takes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage.

If this reduces the target to 0 hit points, the medic can choose to leave the target {@condition unconscious} but stable. If it does so, the target remains {@condition unconscious} for {@dice 1d4} hours, even if it regains hit points. A {@dc 14} Wisdom ({@skill Medicine|XPHB}) check made as an action can awaken a creature from this unconsciousness early if it has 1 or more hit points.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Sentinel Marshal casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}):

trait.name: Aura of Protection
entries: The Sentinel Marshal and all allies within 10 feet of it gain a bonus to all saving throws equal to the Sentinel Marshal's Charisma modifier (already included in the Sentinel Marshal's saving throws). The aura exists as long as the Sentinel Marshal is conscious.

trait.name: Faith's Shield
entries: The Sentinel Marshal's AC includes a magical +2 bonus.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Sentinel Marshal makes two attacks with its longsword.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

reaction.name: Vigilant Guardian (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the Sentinel Marshal that it can see is hit by an attack, the Sentinel Marshal can swap places with that creature, and be hit by the attack instead

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: The Silver Key has advantage on saving throws against poison.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the Silver Key is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the Silver Key instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Vault Delver
entries: The Silver Key has advantage on ability checks made to detect secret doors and open or disable locks, and on saving throws against traps.

trait.name: Ward Breaker
entries: The first time the Silver Key would activate, trigger, or have its movement or actions restricted by an abjuration spell, it may make an Intelligence ability check with advantage against a DC equal to the spell save DC of the spell's caster. If the Silver Key's check is successful, it is immune to that casting of the spell, bypassing all of its effects without triggering, activating, or being restricted by it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Silver Key makes two attacks with its battleaxe.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Light Hammer
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: The Silver Key takes the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: The Silver Key halves the damage that it takes from an attack that hits it. The Silver Key must be able to see the attacker

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The warden casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}):

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The warden has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put it to sleep.

trait.name: Windfall
entries: The warden does not take damage from falling.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The warden makes two attacks with its rapier or dagger, then uses Storm Fist if available.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage and 9 ({@damage 2d8}) thunder damage, and the impact can be heard up to 300 feet away.

action.name: Storm Fist {@recharge 5}
entries: The warden sends a short magical burst of hurricane-force winds at one creature it can see within 60 feet. The target must make a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw. On a failure, the target takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage and is pushed 15 feet away from the warden, then falls {@condition prone}. On a success, the target takes half damage and is not pushed or knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Warding Gale (3/Day)
entries: When the warden is hit by an attack roll, it can force the attacker the reroll the attack roll with disadvantage. If the warden does, all attacks made against it have disadvantage until the start of its next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The entertainer casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The entertainer has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put it to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The entertainer uses its trick instrument to make three of the following attacks in any combination: a melee attack with a retractable blade, or a ranged attack fired from a hidden compartment.

action.name: Trick Instrument
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 100/250 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

bonus.name: Shadow Jump
entries: The entertainer can teleport while in dim light or darkness up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that is also in dim light or darkness.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The bounty hunter casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bounty hunter makes two battleaxe attacks then uses Take Down. If it has a club drawn, the bounty hunter can't use Take Down, but can make a club attack.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Take Down
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}the target is {@condition grappled} if it is a Large or smaller creature (escape {@dc 17}). If the target is a humanoid, it is also knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Collar
entries: The bounty hunter places manacles on a {@condition prone} humanoid it is grappling. A manacled target is {@condition restrained} and can only make weapon attacks with light weapons and unarmed strikes. The target can use its action to attempt to break the manacles with a {@dc 25} Strength check or escape them with a {@dc 25} Dexterity check.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The unbound scroll casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

spellcasting.name: Master of the Unbound Glyph (3/Day)
headerEntries: The unbound scroll casts {@spell glyph of warding|XPHB} as an action, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}). The effects of the spell gain several additional benefits, as follows:

items: The glyph can be inscribed as a 5-foot wide, visible, glowing illusion in midair, in any space the unbound scroll can see within 100 feet.
The glyph can be triggered immediately.
The unbound scroll can designate any number of creatures it can see to be immune to that casting of the spell.

trait.name: Gnome Cunning
entries: The unbound scroll has advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

action.name: Arcane Burst
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) force damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The beastspeaker casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}). When it does so it may target a monstrosity with an Intelligence score of 3 or lower:

trait.name: Primal Companion
entries: The beastspeaker is bonded to a companion: a beast or monstrosity with an Intelligence score of 7 or lower that has a challenge rating of 3, and which does not use manufactured weapons to make attacks. The companion shares the beastspeaker's alignment, is immune to being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}, understands one language the beastspeaker does (although it does not gain the ability to speak if it is not naturally capable of doing so), and has advantage on attack rolls against all creatures within 15 feet of the beastspeaker.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: Urge Companion
entries: If the beastspeaker is within 15 feet of its companion, the beastspeaker can expend a use of a spell it has remaining that day. When it does, the beastspeaker does not cast the spell. Instead, the companion uses any action listed in its stat block—including the Multiattack action if it has it—as a reaction.

monster.name: Kara Yafta Ulak
languages: Common plus any two other languages

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The courier casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Dexterity as the spellcasting ability:

trait.name: Determined Stride
entries: When the courier teleports any distance or takes the Dash action, difficult terrain doesn't cost it extra movement until the end of its turn.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the courier is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The courier makes two attacks with its rapier.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Dimension Step (2nd-Level Spell; 3/Day)
entries: The courier and all equipment it is wearing or carrying teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of it.

bonus.name: Lightfooted
entries: The courier takes the Dash or Disengage action.

reaction.name: Impossible Dodge
entries: When the courier is hit by an attack it can see, it can expend one use of a spell it has left that day. If it does so, the spell is not cast, but the attack misses as the courier instantly teleports out of and immediately back into its space.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Keltis is a 2nd-level spellcaster. His spellcastingability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Reaper
entries: When Keltis casts {@spell toll the dead|XPHB}, he can target two creatures in range who are within 5 feet of each other.

trait.name: Touch of Death (1/Short or Long Rest)
entries: When Keltis hits with a melee attack, he can deal an additional 9 necrotic damage to his target.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Mallora is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells: {@spell chill touch|XPHB} (+1 damage due to arcane focus)

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Wand of Magic Missiles (5 charges)
entries: Mallora can cast {@spell magic missile|XPHB} using her wand. Casting magic missile costs one charge per level the spell is cast at.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The zombie has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the zombie's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Beak:
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Garrow is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell at- tacks). He has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Change Appearance
entries: Garrow can change his appearance or revert to his natural form as an action. He can transform himself into another Medium sized creature of humanoid shape, but his clothing, equipment, and game statistics do not change. If someone has reason to suspect his ruse, he has advantage on any Charisma ({@skill Deception|XPHB}) check made to avoid detection.

trait.name: Reaper
entries: When Garrow casts {@spell chill touch|XPHB}, he can target two creatures in range who are within 5 feet of each other.

trait.name: Touch of Death (1/Short or Long Rest)
entries: When Garrow hits with a melee attack, he can deal an additional 15 necrotic damage to his target.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Unsettling Visage (1/Short or long rest)
entries: When a creature Garrow can see makes an attack roll against him, Garrow can impose disadvantage on the roll, revealing his shapeshifting nature to any creature within 30 feet that can see him.
